pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Gene-Treatment Interaction Exploiting Randomization // Estimation of gene-treatment interactions in randomized clinical trials exploiting gene-treatment independence. Methods used in the package refer to J. Y. Dai, M. LeBlanc, and C. Kooperberg (2009) Biometrics doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2008.01046.x.
